ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Couple of  questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I m late responding to my emails because I ve been playing EQ alot. I got my cleric from 44 to 51. :) The zone to CC is a thing you click on inside the Rygor
ygData.messageBody:
I'm late responding to my emails because I've been playing EQ alot. I got my
cleric from 44 to 51. :)
The zone to CC is a thing you click on inside the Rygor orc fort in EW. you
need camo/invis to get inside. The rygor orcs run with sow so they can
easily chase you down. and they stun. Very very nasty critters.
luv,
-Su

How does one get to Crystal Caverns? I have always wanted to go but dont
know hw to get there. I am a 36 ranger can I play there?
----- Original Message -----
From: erik
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 16, 2002 7:48 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Couple of questions


> From: "Jerry M. Banks" <y2kansas@...>
>
> I just hit level 30 last night, and being the Druid that I am, I had a
> couple of questions.
>
> First, I've been hunting in South Karana since level 25, hunting the
Tesch
> Mas Gnolls around Paw, and perhaps have become a little spoiled, as I
have
> been getting great experience killing the yellows and whites, and
reaping
> the rewards of the loot. Now, having reached level 30, all of the gnolls
are
> now nearing the point where hunting them isn't beneficial. Could someone
> suggest a similar zone/area with good experience and average to good
loot
> where I could hunt fairly safely, either in a group or solo?

You can try going inside Paw (I was actually hunting in Paw from 25 to
about
30, altough you can hunt in Paw longer than that).

After that, I went to RM to hunt HGs and spent some time in Crystal
Caverns.
I basically did 30-40 in RM, CC, OT and Eastern Wastes (with a couple
unsuccessful trips to Tower of the Frozen Shadow).

I would make sure that you get as much experience dungeons as you can
though. LGuk and SolB (along with CC) are good places to try to find a
group. I did some hunting in SolA at 30, but you really need to go deep
to
get good XP there.

Sulamwen
Half Elf Pathfinder
E'ci
